tool_description: Generates demand forecasts using selected forecasting models, incorporating seasonality, trends, and external factors with confidence intervals.

forecast_periods.description: Number of future periods to forecast

seasonal_periods.description: Number of periods in seasonal cycle

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 2 full seasonal cycles for reliable forecasting
Invalid forecast model: Model not recognized or not available
Invalid forecast periods: Must be positive integer, typically 1-52 periods
Confidence level out of range: Must be between 0.5 and 0.99
Invalid seasonal periods: Must be positive integer matching data frequency
usage: Provide historical_data, select forecast_model, and specify forecast_periods. Adjust confidence_level and seasonal_periods as needed.

forecast_values.description: Point forecasts for each future period
